p: 13. Line 255-257 of page 12, “Polysaccharide yield decreased in a rapid manner with increasing ethanol concentration (Fig 1B), with the maximum yield of 0.46% observed at the lowest studied concentration (20%)” was revised as “Fig 1B shows that the polysaccharide yield decreased in a rapid manner with increasing ethanol concentration in the scope of test, with the maximum yield of 0.46% observed at the lowest concentration of 20%”.
